talk.author: did:plc:hpjclsn3u2r47hkw3kb2e6zp
talk.utter: I still think something more is going on. The response was so out of proportion, not to mention legally dubious. Wonder what else the Recorder was investigating that they haven’t shared. At least the police chief has failed epically at keeping his past secret.

talk.author: did:plc:3rxcq5wacdop5thjoh3sny3p
talk.utter: This has been standard cop practice for dealing with reporters who piss them off since time immemorial. We got a generation long lull in there (mostly) thanks to the extraordinary efforts of pro-democracy activists

talk.author: did:plc:hpjclsn3u2r47hkw3kb2e6zp
talk.utter: I’m glad major outlets are on the story now.
